title: website: add links to SO and Reddit
body:
In order to better support the growth of the community, and to keep traffic on golang-users@ manageable, I would like to see our Stack Overflow and /r/reddit communities linked from the golang.org website.

As discussed with @adg, the proposal is to add links to these destinations:

http://stackoverflow.com/tags/go
https://www.reddit.com/r/golang

Logical place for these to be placed is on http://golang.org/project/ near the references to the mailing lists (although I was hoping for something more prominent).
